name: Skeleton Rifler
languages: understands languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Dead Rifle
entries: The rifle a skeleton rifler carries is nonfunctional as a ranged weapon for a creature other than a skeleton rifler. For the skeleton rifler, the rifle never needs to be reloaded.

actions.name: Bayonet
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage and 3 (1d6 damage) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Dead Rifle
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. 8 (1d12 + 2 damage) piercing damage and 3 (1d6 damage) necrotic damage.
